body_html:
@ozancaglayan @ngimel I am running in to this issue for Ti 1080. I am running python on Conda environment, And I tried immu=soft, But that did not work out. My ACS command is not giving the expected output,SO I am not able to check if ACS is enabled or not. Still stuck
CPU Detail:
bansa01@vita2:~/pytorch_wideres/tmp_spectral/WideResNet-pytorch$ cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep vendor | uniq
vendor_id : GenuineIntel
